plays.text: Goal scored by Kevyn Adams assisted by Bates Battaglia and Aaron Ward

Penalty to Darcy Tucker 2 minutes for Tripping Craig Adams
Penalty to Ryan Bayda 2 minutes for Tripping Alexander Mogilny
Penalty to Nikolai Antropov 2 minutes for Slashing Aaron Ward
Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Mats Sundin and Gary Roberts
Penalty to Jonas Hoglund 2 minutes for Hooking Josef Vasicek
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mats Sundin
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Tripping Bates Battaglia

Penalty to Jan Hlavac 2 minutes for Hooking Jyrki Lumme
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Hooking Robert Reichel
Penalty to Alexander Mogilny 2 minutes for Slashing Aaron Ward
Goal scored by Tom Fitzgerald assisted by Robert Reichel
Penalty to Aki Berg 2 minutes for Crosschecking Kevyn Adams
Penalty to Kevyn Adams 2 minutes for High Sticking Tomas Kaberle
Penalty to Nikolai Antropov 2 minutes for Crosschecking David Tanabe
Goal scored by Darcy Tucker assisted by Alyn McCauley and Wade Belak
Penalty to Kevyn Adams 2 minutes for Slashing Gary Roberts
